footer.description: National Highland Festival - Azerbaijan's biggest cultural event

about.title: About Festival
about.description:
National Highland Festival is Azerbaijan's biggest and most prestigious cultural event. This festival, which attracts thousands of visitors every year, brings together our nation's rich cultural heritage, traditions and modern art forms.

During the festival, visitors can get acquainted with traditional music, dance, handicrafts, national cuisine and many other interesting activities. Modern art forms are also presented.

This festival is not just entertainment, but also an important platform for preserving our cultural values and passing them on to future generations.

sponsorship.title: Become a Sponsor
sponsorship.description: By sponsoring the National Highland Festival, you can contribute to Azerbaijan's cultural life.
